1{-# LANGUAGE FlexibleContexts #-}
2{-# LANGUAGE ViewPatterns #-}
3{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
4
5-- | Tokenizer for relational section.
6
7module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Token.Rel
8  ( scanRel,
9    scanInterp,
10  ) where
11
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture               as O
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                   as B
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Symbol          as S
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Token.Clip      as S
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Token.Token     as S
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Token.Section   as S
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Message           as Msg
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Token.Message   as Msg
20
21
22-- ----------------------  Utility
23
24tCut3 :: (O.Textual t) => Char -> (Int -> Char -> Char -> Char -> t -> t -> t -> a) -> t -> a
25tCut3 z f = first where
26    first (O.cut -> O.Jp a bs)
27                     = second a bs
28    first _          = f 0 z z z O.tEmpty O.tEmpty O.tEmpty
29
30    second a bs@(O.cut -> O.Jp b cs)
31                     = third a b bs cs
32    second a _       = f 1 a z z O.tEmpty O.tEmpty O.tEmpty
33
34    third a b bs cs@(O.cut -> O.Jp c ds)
35                     = f 3 a b c bs cs ds
36    third a b bs _   = f 2 a b z bs O.tEmpty O.tEmpty
37
38-- | Convert hexadecimal text to integers.
39--
40--   >>> textHexInts "20+21"
41--   Just [32,33]
42--
43textHexInts :: (O.Textual t) => t -> Maybe [Int]
44textHexInts = mapM O.tHexInt . B.omit O.tIsEmpty . O.tDivide (== '+')
45
46-- Punctuations
47isOpen, isClose, isGrip, isSingle, isQ, isPM :: O.Test Char
48isOpen     = ( `elem` "([{"    )  -- Punctuation
49isClose    = ( `elem` "}])"    )  -- Punctuation
50isGrip     = ( `elem` "-=|?"   )  -- Punctuation | Symbol   -- :*+
51isSingle   = ( `elem` ":|#"    )  -- Punctuation | Symbol
52isQ        = (    ==  '\''     )  -- Punctuation
53isPM a     = (a == '+' || a == '-')
54
55
56-- ----------------------  Relational section
57
58-- | Scan a next token in relational section.
59scanRel :: (S.TextualTermName t) => S.Scanner t
60scanRel change sc@B.CodeScan { B.scanCp = cp, B.scanCache = wtab } = sc' where
61
62    clip         = S.clipUpdate   sc
63    clipw        = S.clipUpdateC  sc
64    clipcl       = S.clipUpdateCL sc
65    upd cs tok   = B.codeUpdate cs tok sc
66    updEnd       = upd O.tEmpty
67    int cs tok   = B.codeChange (scanInterp change) $ B.codeScanSave $ upd cs tok
68    raw          = S.TText cp S.TextRaw
69
70    -- ----------------------  dispatch
71
72    sc' = S.section change (tCut3 '\0' dispatch) sc
73
74    dispatch n a b c bs cs ds
75        | S.isSpace a            = clip    $ S.clipSpace    cp bs
76        | S.isTerm a             = clipcl  $ S.clipTermName cp wtab bs
77        | isPM a && S.isTerm b   = clipcl  $ S.clipTermSign (O.char2T a b) cp wtab cs
78        | S.isQQ a               = clipw   $ S.clipQq       cp wtab bs
79        | isQ a && S.isTerm b    = clipcl  $ S.clipTermQ    cp wtab cs
80        | isQ a && isQ b         = clipw   $ S.clipQn       cp wtab cs
81        | isQ a                  = clipw   $ S.clipQ        cp wtab bs
82
83        | a == '(' && c == ')' && b `elem` "+-/=#"
84                                 = upd ds  $ raw              (O.char3T a b c)
85        | a == '{' && b == '|'   = int cs  $ S.TOpen      cp (O.char2T a b)
86        | isOpen a && isGrip b   = upd cs  $ S.TOpen      cp (O.char2T a b)
87        | isGrip a && isClose b  = upd cs  $ S.TClose     cp (O.char2T a b)
88        | isOpen a               = upd bs  $ S.TOpen      cp (O.charT a)
89        | isClose a              = upd bs  $ S.TClose     cp (O.charT a)
90
91        | a == '*'               = aster bs (O.charT a)
92        | a == '<'               = clip    $ clipAngle cp bs
93        | a == '@'               = clip    $ clipAt    cp bs 1
94        | a == '|'               = clip    $ S.clipBar cp bs
95        | a == '^'               = clip    $ clipHat   cp bs
96        | a == '#' && b == '!'   = updEnd  $ S.TComment cp bs
97        | a == '-' && b == '*' && c == '-'
98                                 = updEnd  $ S.TComment cp bs
99
100        | isSingle a             = upd bs  $ raw (O.charT a)
101        | S.isSymbol a           = clipw   $ S.clipSymbol cp wtab (a O.<:> bs)
102        | n == 0                 = sc
103        | otherwise              = upd O.tEmpty $ S.unknownToken cp cs
104                                                $ Msg.forbiddenInput $ S.angleQuote [a]
105
106    aster (O.cut -> O.Jp c cs) w
107        | w == O.stringT "****"  = upd (c O.<:> cs) $ raw w
108        | c == '*'               = aster cs (c O.<:> w)
109    aster cs w
110        | w == O.stringT "**"    = updEnd  $ S.TComment cp cs
111        | w == O.stringT "***"   = updEnd  $ S.TComment cp cs
112        | otherwise              = clipw   $ S.clipSymbol cp wtab $ w O.++ cs
113
114-- | Clip token beginning with @'<'@.
115--
116--   >>> clipAngle B.def "crlf> ..."
117--   (" ...", TText /0.0.0/ TextKey "\r\n")
118--
119--   >>> clipAngle B.def "> 0"
120--   (" 0", TText /0.0.0/ TextRaw "<>")
121--
122--   >>> clipAngle B.def "<< 0"
123--   (" 0",TText /0.0.0/ TextRaw "<<<")
124--
125--   >>> clipAngle B.def "U+4B> ..."
126--   (" ...", TText /0.0.0/ TextKey "K")
127--
128clipAngle :: (O.Textual t) => B.TCodePos t -> t -> S.ClipResult t
129clipAngle cp cs0 = angle (0 :: Int) cs0 where
130    raw = S.TText cp S.TextRaw
131    text n = O.tTake n cs0
132
133    -- <...
134    angle n (O.cut -> O.Jp c cs)
135        | S.isSymbol c  = sym n (c O.<:> cs)
136    angle n cs          = (cs, raw ('<' O.<:> text n))
137
138    -- <symbol ...
139    sym n (O.cut -> O.Jp c cs)
140        | c == '>'      = close n cs
141        | S.isSymbol c  = sym (n + 1) cs
142    sym n cs            = (cs, raw ('<' O.<:> text n)) -- '<<'
143
144    -- <symbol> ...
145    close n (O.cut -> O.Jp c cs)
146        | c == '>'    = close (n + 1) cs
147    close n cs        = (cs, key $ text n)
148
149    -- symbol in '<symbol>'
150    key (O.cut2 -> O.Jp2 'U' '+' s) = fromCodePoint textHexInts s
151    key s | O.tIsEmpty s   = raw $ O.stringT "<>"
152          | otherwise      = case lookup s S.angleTexts of
153                               Just w  -> S.TText cp S.TextKey w
154                               Nothing -> S.TText cp S.TextUnk s
155    fromCodePoint f s =
156        case f s of
157          Just ns  -> S.TText cp S.TextKey $ tFromCode ns
158          Nothing  -> S.TText cp S.TextUnk s
159
160tFromCode :: (O.Textual t) => [Int] -> t
161tFromCode ns = O.stringT (toEnum <$> ns)
162
163-- | Clip token beginning with "@".
164clipAt :: (O.Textual t) => B.TCodePos t -> t -> Int -> S.ClipResult t
165clipAt cp = at where
166    at (O.cut -> O.Jp c cs)
167       n | c == '@'    = at cs $ n + 1
168         | c == '\''   = S.clipSlot 0 cp cs  -- positional
169    at cs n            = S.clipSlot n cp cs
170
171-- | Clip local reference token, like @^/g@.
172clipHat :: (S.TextualTermName t) => B.TCodePos t -> t -> S.ClipResult t
173clipHat cp = hat where
174    hat (O.cut -> O.Jp '/' cs) = localToken cs (S.LocalNest . S.toTermName)
175    hat cs@(O.cut -> O.Jp c _)
176        | S.isSymbol c          = localToken cs (S.LocalSymbol . O.tString)
177    hat cs                      = (O.tEmpty, S.unknownToken cp cs $ Msg.adlib "local")
178
179    localToken cs k = case S.nextSymbolPlain cs of
180                        Right (cs', w) -> (cs', S.TLocal cp (k w) (-1) [])
181                        Left a         -> (O.tEmpty, S.TUnknown cp cs a)
182
183
184-- ----------------------  Interpretation
185
186-- | Scan interpretation content between @{|@ and @|}@.
187scanInterp :: (O.Textual t) => S.Scanner t
188scanInterp change sc@B.CodeScan { B.scanCp = cp
189                                , B.scanCache = wtab } = S.section change int sc where
190    clip        = S.clipUpdate   sc
191    clipcl      = S.clipUpdateCL sc
192    upd cs tok  = B.codeUpdate cs tok sc
193    gen cs tok  = B.codeScanRestore $ upd cs tok
194
195    int (O.cut -> O.Jp c cs)
196        | S.isSpace c   = clip   $ S.clipSpace    cp cs
197        | S.isTerm c    = clipcl $ S.clipTermName cp wtab cs
198        | otherwise     = word (c O.<:> cs)
199    int _               = sc
200
201    word cs0 = loop O.zero cs0 where
202        raw n = S.TText cp S.TextRaw $ O.tTake n cs0
203        loop n cs@(O.cut2 -> O.Jp2 '|' '}' _)
204                            = gen  cs            $ raw n
205        loop n (O.cut -> O.Jp c cs)
206            | S.isSpace c   = upd  (c O.<:> cs) $ raw n
207            | S.isTerm c    = upd  (c O.<:> cs) $ raw n
208            | otherwise     = loop (n + 1) cs
209        loop n cs           = upd  cs            $ raw n
210
